loadmessage: Language set to English. Welcome, choomba!

self.label: Self Menu
self.tip: Modify player stats, movement, stealth, and health behavior.

development.label: Development Menu
development.tip: Adjust attributes and toggle individual perks.
development.warning: Adjusting attributes, perks, or proficiencies may alter progression.(It's recommended to save first)

modifiers.label: Modifiers Menu
modifiers.tip: Manage all ability cooldowns and recovery rates such as grenades, cloaking, and quickhacks.

teleport.label: Teleport Menu
teleport.tip: Teleport instantly to preset locations in Night City.

weapon.label: Weapon Menu
weapon.tip: Access various weapon-related features including special abilities, projectile behavior, and customization.

vehicle.label: Vehicle Menu
vehicle.tip: Manage vehicles, spawn new ones, and control vehicle Elements.

facts.label: Facts Menu
facts.tip: Set story flags, censorship states, and progression facts.
facts.warning: Adjusting game facts can impact story & endings.(It's recommended to save first)

time.label: Time Menu
time.tip: Control time of day, time skip, freezing, syncing, and speed multipliers.

weather.label: Weather Menu
weather.tip: Control world weather, force storms, fog, and more.

translations.label: Translations
translations.tip: Change the language used for the trainer's interface.

items.label: Item Menu(Alpha)
items.tip: Browse items by category, consumables, crafting, and buffs. (Item Browser is very alpha)

settingsmenu.label: Settings Menu
settingsmenu.tip: Configure GoodFeelings options, navigation, and user interface.

godmode.label: God Mode
godmode.tip: Makes you invincible to all forms of damage.

invisibility.label: Invisibility
invisibility.tip: Applies the optical cloaking effect. Enemies may still detect you if provoked.

superspeed.label: Super Speed
superspeed.tip:
Enables rapid movement via time dilation.
Tip: Combine with Player Speed Multiplier for better effect.

infinitejump.label: Infinite Jumps
infinitejump.tip:
Allows unlimited mid-air jumps.

Requires Reinforced Tendons cyberware to be equipped.
Save and reload after toggling to apply or remove the effect.

infiniteairdash.label: Infinite Air Dash
infiniteairdash.tip:
Allows unlimited mid-air air dash.

Requires Air Dash Perk Level 3 to be equipped.

playerspeedmultiplier.label: Player Speed Multiplier
playerspeedmultiplier.tip: Scales the player's top movement speed.

jumpheightmultiplier.label: Jump Height Multiplier
jumpheightmultiplier.tip: Adjusts how high the player can jump.

quicksilversandevistan.label: Quicksilver's Sandevistan
quicksilversandevistan.tip: Modifies your Sandevistan to feel like Quicksilver extreme slowdown when activated.

noclip.label: Noclip
noclip.tip:
Enables free movement through the world, ignoring collision and gravity. Gameplay restrictions are applied while active.

Keyboard: W/S = Forward/Back, A/D = Strafe, Space = Up, Ctrl = Down, Shift = Boost, Mouse = Look
Controller: Left Stick = Move, Right Stick = Look, RB = Up, LB = Down, LS Click = Boost

neverwanted.label: Never Wanted
neverwanted.tip: Prevents the police from engaging or pursuing you.

wantedlevel.label: Wanted Level
wantedlevel.tip: Set and optionally lock your current wanted level.

clearwanted.label: Clear Wanted Level
clearwanted.tip: Temporarily disables the police system to reset wanted level

refillhealth.label: Refill Health (loop)
refillhealth.tip: Automatically refills health to 100% when it drops below 98%.

healthregen.label: Health Regen + Boost
healthregen.tip: Enables extreme passive regeneration and a bonus health buffer.

armorboost.label: Armor Boost
armorboost.tip: Applies a massive armor increase for defense.

nonthreat.label: Non-Threat Status
nonthreat.tip: Enemies will notice and track you, but won't enter combat unless you interact or attack.

lowtracerate.label: Low Trace Rate
lowtracerate.tip: Reduces the trace speed from enemy netrunners.

refillmemory.label: Refill Memory (loop)
refillmemory.tip: Refills cyberdeck memory to 100% if it drops below 98%.

forcefield.label: Forcefield
forcefield.tip: Creates a continuous destructive wave of force around the player (Radius: 15m). Caution: Destructive.

custom.label: Custom Modifiers (Not Tested Enough)
custom.tip: Create and manage your own stat modifiers for player, weapons, or vehicles.

cycledifficulty.label: Cycle Game Difficulty
cycledifficulty.tip: Cycles through Story -> Easy -> Hard -> Very Hard difficulty levels.

refilloxygen.label: Refill Oxygen (loop)
refilloxygen.tip: Automatically restores oxygen when it drops.

cooldowncloak.label: Optical Cloak
cooldowncloak.tip: Eliminates optical camo cooldown and boosts regen.

cooldownoverclock.label: Overclock
cooldownoverclock.tip: Boosts Overclock regen and removes cooldown.

reducequickhackcost.label: Reduce Quickhack Cost
reducequickhackcost.tip: Removes all memory costs from quickhacks.

setmemorystat.label: Set Memory Stat
setmemorystat.tip: Overrides base memory stat for cyberdeck.

airthrusterboots.label: Air Thruster Boots
airthrusterboots.tip: Hold jump in mid-air to reduce fall damage impact.

airhover.label: Air Hover
airhover.tip: Allows hovering in the air after jumping.

sandevistanduration.label: Sandevistan Duration
sandevistanduration.tip: Extends duration of your Sandevistan mode.

sandevistanscale.label: Sandevistan Time Scale
sandevistanscale.tip: Controls time dilation while Sandevistan is active.

fov.label: Field of View (FOV)
fov.tip: Adjusts your field of view (65-115). Resets camera zoom on change.

proficiencies.label: Proficiencies Levels
proficiencies.tip: Edit your level values and XP tracks for every Proficiency.

resources.label: Resources
resources.tip: Add or remove money, perk points, and attribute points.

setlevel.label: Set Attribute Level
setlevel.tip: Set base level for this attribute.

perks.tipsingle:
{category}

This perk has 1 level. Toggle on/off to acquire or remove it.
perks.tipmulti:
{category}

This perk has {levels} levels. Activate repeatedly to acquire levels, or reset to remove them.

filter.label: Perk Filter
filter.tip: Choose which perks to display: All, Active only, or Inactive only.

available.label: Available Perk Points:
available.tip: Available points to spend on perks. You can add or remove points using the options below.

available.label: Available Attribute Points:
available.tip: Available points to spend on attributes. You can add or remove points using the options below.

available.label: Available Relic Points:
available.tip: Available points to unlock Relic-based perks.

mode.label: Mode
mode.tip: Select the mode for custom modifiers.

target.label: Target
target.tip: Select the target to apply the modifier to.

nomodifiers.label: No Modifiers Created
nomodifiers.tip: Switch to 'Create' mode to add new ones.

norecent.label: No Recent Modifiers
norecent.tip: Create or delete a modifier to track it here.

create.label: Create Modifier
create.tip: Configure a custom modifier for this stat.

recreate.label: Re-create Modifier
recreate.tip: Re-create a modifier for this stat.

setallcolor.label: Set All Lights Color
setallcolor.tip: Applies the selected color to all light types.

applyallcolor.label: Apply All Light Colors
applyallcolor.tip: Sets all lights to the selected color.

resetallcolor.label: Reset All Light Colors
resetallcolor.tip: Resets the color of all lights.

rgbfade.label: RGB Fade Lights
rgbfade.tip: Automatically cycles light colors through an RGB fade effect.

lighttype.label: Light Type
lighttype.tip: Choose which light type to configure.

vehiclelist.title: Vehicle List

mode.label: Mode
mode.tip:
Filter Modes:
- All Vehicles: Shows all vehicles (Can be laggy)
- Player Vehicles: Classified as player-ownable
- By Category: Filter by vehicle category
- By Manufacturer: Filter by vehicle brand
- By Affiliation: Filter by faction or group

spawndistance.label: Spawn Distance
spawndistance.tip: Distance the vehicle spawns in front of the player.

filteredlist.label: Filtered Vehicle List
filteredlist.tip: List of vehicles matching the selected filters.

nofound.label: No Matching Vehicles Found
nofound.tip: No vehicles match the current filter.

deletelast.label: Delete Last Vehicle
deletelast.tip: When enabled, your previously mounted vehicle will be automatically despawned after you spawn a new one.

mountonspawn.label: Mount on Spawn
mountonspawn.tip: When enabled, you will be automatically mounted into the driver seat after spawning a vehicle.

previewvehicle.label: Preview Vehicle
previewvehicle.tip: When enabled, a preview of the vehicle will be displayed in front of the player. Warning: collision is still on.

vehiclelist.unlockedtip:
Note: Enabled vehicles are unlocked and appear in your owned menu. Click to toggle them on or off.

{details}
vehiclelist.spawntip:
Note: You may need to click twice to request the vehicle.

{details}

vehiclelist.label: Vehicle List
vehiclelist.tip: View all vehicles and toggle which ones are enabled or disabled in your owned vehicle menu.

mountonroof.label: Mount on Roof
mountonroof.tip: Unmounts you from the driver seat and places your character sitting on top of the current vehicle.

unlockplayer.label: Unlock Player Vehicles
unlockplayer.tip: Unlock all vehicles assigned to the Player faction.

disableplayer.label: Disable Player Vehicles
disableplayer.tip: Disable all vehicles assigned to the Player faction.

unlockmodded.label: Unlock Modded Vehicles
unlockmodded.tip: Unlock all add-on vehicles installed through mods.

disablemodded.label: Disable Modded Vehicles
disablemodded.tip: Disable all add-on vehicles installed through mods.

unlockfaction.label: Unlock Faction Vehicles
unlockfaction.tip: Unlock all vehicles belonging to the selected faction.

lockfaction.label: Disable Faction Vehicles
lockfaction.tip: Disable all vehicles belonging to the selected faction.

nitrous.label: Nitrous Boost
nitrous.tip: Hold Left Shift (keyboard) or X (controller) while driving to activate a forward force boost. Adjust the force multiplier to control how strong the boost feels.

freezequesttimer.label: Freeze Quest Timer
freezequesttimer.tip: Disables vehicle quest countdown timers so they no longer track time.

vehiclespawner.label: Vehicle Spawner
vehiclespawner.tip: Request any vehicles directly in front of the player. Does not add them to your owned list.

vehicleheadlights.label: Vehicle Headlights
vehicleheadlights.tip: Control vehicle headlights and light types.

randomize.label: Randomize Appearance
randomize.tip: Instantly randomizes the appearance (color/livery) of your currently mounted vehicle.

policesiren.label: Police Siren Lights
policesiren.tip: Alternates vehicle lights between Red and Blue, mimicking a police siren effect.

vehiclelaunch.label: Launch Vehicle
vehiclelaunch.tip: Enables the ability to launch your vehicle into the air. Press Space (keyboard) or A (controller) to leap upward.

instaflip.label: Insta Flip
instaflip.tip: Instantly flips your current vehicle back onto its wheels if it is overturned.

vehiclenoclip.label: Vehicle No-Clip
vehiclenoclip.tip: Toggle noclip mode for your current vehicle

doorstate.label: Door State
doorstate.tip: Select the desired state for the door.

weaponitems.label: Weapon Items
weaponitems.tip: Add any weapon item to your inventory, including iconic and stash wall variants.

explosivebullets.label: Explosive Bullets
explosivebullets.tip: Shooting causes explosions at your crosshair location, regardless of bullet type or impact.

explosiveknives.label: Explosive Knives
explosiveknives.tip: Thrown knives explode on impact, creating an explosion at the hit location.

forcegun.label: Force Gun
forcegun.tip: Fires a powerful kinetic blast while aiming down sights. Works best on vehicles, launching them away on impact.

giveallwallweapons.label: Give All Wall Weapons
giveallwallweapons.tip: Gives you all weapons that can be mounted on your apartment wall.

givealliconicweapons.label: Give All Iconic Weapons
givealliconicweapons.tip: Adds all iconic weapons to your inventory.

removeallweapons.label: Remove All Weapons
removeallweapons.tip: Removes every weapon from your inventory.

infiniteammo.label: Infinite Ammo
infiniteammo.tip: Your ammo never runs out. Each time you shoot, you instantly get the bullet back.

noreload.label: No Reload
noreload.tip: Removes reload time. Fire continuously without waiting to reload.

norecoil.label: No Recoil
norecoil.tip:
Removes recoil from all weapons. No more shaking when firing.
Tip: Great with Problem Solver.

flyingthundergod.label: Flying Thunder God Technique
flyingthundergod.tip: Throw a knife to instantly teleport to its location upon impact

gravitygun.label: Gravity Gun
gravitygun.tip: Pick up and move vehicles or objects by aiming at them.

smartbladereturn.label: Smart Blade Return
smartbladereturn.tip: Thrown knives or projectiles automatically return to you after hitting a target or surface.

teleygun.label: Teley Gun
teleygun.tip: Shoot bullets that teleport you to where they land.

alwayscrit.label: Always Critical
alwayscrit.tip: Every attack you make is guaranteed to be a critical hit.

insanecritdmg.label: Insane Critical Damage
insanecritdmg.tip: Adds an extreme boost to critical hit damage for devastating blows.

rapidfire.label: Rapid Fire
rapidfire.tip: Drastically increases weapon fire rate by reducing cycle time.

shotgunspray.label: Shotgun Spray
shotgunspray.tip: Adds extra projectiles per shot, turning any gun into a shotgun.

melee_highblock.label: High Block
melee_highblock.tip: Boosts melee block factor, letting you absorb far more incoming damage when blocking.

melee_lowstamina.label: Low Stamina Cost
melee_lowstamina.tip: Reduces stamina cost of melee attacks, letting you chain combos longer without tiring.

melee_bladecarnage.label: Blade Carnage
melee_bladecarnage.tip: Greatly increases dismemberment chance with bladed weapons.

melee_infinitecombo.label: Infinite Combo
melee_infinitecombo.tip: Removes the combo limit for melee weapons. Chain endless attacks without interruption.

smart_fastlock.label: Smart Weapon: Fast Lock
smart_fastlock.tip: Speeds up smart weapon lock-on both in ADS and hip-fire modes.

smart_widelock.label: Smart Weapon: Wide Lock
smart_widelock.tip: Widens the lock-on rectangle for ADS and hip-fire, making it easier to track targets.

smart_extratargets.label: Smart Weapon: Extra Targets
smart_extratargets.tip: Allows smart weapons to lock onto additional targets simultaneously.

smart_perfectacc.label: Smart Weapon: Perfect Accuracy
smart_perfectacc.tip: Ensures projectiles never miss once locked. Removes lock error and miss radius.

smart_fastproj.label: Smart Weapon: Fast Projectiles
smart_fastproj.tip: Increases the speed of smart weapon projectiles for quicker hits.

smart_longrange.label: Smart Weapon: Long Range
smart_longrange.tip: Extends smart weapon lock-on and target acquisition range significantly.

unlimitedrange.label: Higher Range
unlimitedrange.tip: Multiplies weapon effective and maximum range by 200x, allowing hits far beyond normal limits.

penetrationrounds.label: Penetration Rounds
penetrationrounds.tip: All bullets ignore armor and pierce through cover, just like tech weapons.

hipfireaccuracy.label: Hipfire Accuracy
hipfireaccuracy.tip: Tightens weapon spread when firing from the hip. Turns guns into hipfire lasers.

adsaccuracy.label: ADS Accuracy
adsaccuracy.tip: Tightens weapon spread when aiming down sights for near-perfect precision.

mode.label: Mode
mode.tip: Choose what set of weapons to display or manage.

actionmode.label: Inventory Action
actionmode.tip: Choose whether to add or remove weapons from your inventory.

refreshinventory.label: Refresh Inventory
refreshinventory.tip: Updates the weapon list from your current inventory.

sortinventory.label: Sort Inventory By
sortinventory.tip: Choose sorting method for inventory weapons.

categories.label: Weapon Categories
categories.tip: View all weapons organized by type and apply filters for Tech, Smart, or Power variants.

onlyiconic.label: Show Only Iconic Weapons
onlyiconic.tip: Display only iconic weapons in the list.

onlyinventory.label: Show Only Inventory Weapons
onlyinventory.tip: Display only the weapons you currently own in your inventory.

giveallwall.label: Give All Wall Weapons
giveallwall.tip: Adds every wall-mountable weapon to your inventory.

removeall.label: Remove All Weapons
removeall.tip: Removes all weapons from your inventory.

givealliconic.label: Give All Iconic Weapons
givealliconic.tip: Adds every iconic weapon to your inventory.

removebase.label: Remove Base Weapons
removebase.tip: Removes all weapons with Common or Base rarity from your inventory.

noweaponsfound.label: No Weapons Found
noweaponsfound.tip: No weapons match the current filter.

noinventoryweapons.label: No Weapons in Inventory
noinventoryweapons.tip: Your inventory does not currently contain any weapons.

category.label: Category
category.tip: Choose a fact category to view.

flagsbreak.label: {category} Flags
flagsbreak.tip: Toggle fact flags for the {category} category.

notavailable.label: N/A
notavailable.tip: No value set for this fact.

judy_romanceable.name: Judy Romanceable
judy_romanceable.desc: Enables Judy as a romance option.

sq030_judy_lover.name: Judy Lover
sq030_judy_lover.desc: Marks Judy as your current lover.

panam_romanceable.name: Panam Romanceable
panam_romanceable.desc: Enables Panam as a romance option.

sq027_panam_lover.name: Panam Lover
sq027_panam_lover.desc: Marks Panam as your current lover.

river_romanceable.name: River Romanceable
river_romanceable.desc: Enables River as a romance option.

sq029_river_lover.name: River Lover
sq029_river_lover.desc: Marks River as your current lover.

kerry_romanceable.name: Kerry Romanceable
kerry_romanceable.desc: Enables Kerry as a romance option.

sq028_kerry_lover.name: Kerry Lover
sq028_kerry_lover.desc: Marks Kerry as your current lover.

q105_fingers_beaten.name: Fingers Beaten
q105_fingers_beaten.desc: Fingers was disabled but remains alive and accessible.

q005_jackie_stay_notell.name: Jackie Left in Car
q005_jackie_stay_notell.desc: Jackie's body was left in the car after the heist.

q005_jackie_to_hospital.name: Jackie Sent to Vik
q005_jackie_to_hospital.desc: Jackie's body was sent to the ripperdoc.

q005_jackie_to_mama.name: Jackie Sent to Mama Welles
q005_jackie_to_mama.desc: Jackie's body was sent to Mama Welles.

q112_takemura_dead.name: Takemura Dead
q112_takemura_dead.desc: Takemura was killed during his mission.

sq032_johnny_friend.name: Johnny Friendly Ending
sq032_johnny_friend.desc: Sets Johnny to the friend epilogue state (oil fields).

mq007_skippy_goes_emo.name: Skippy: Emo Mode
mq007_skippy_goes_emo.desc: Skippy has switched to non-lethal emo mode.

holo_delamain_deep_vehicle_talk.name: Delamain Phone Portrait Fix
holo_delamain_deep_vehicle_talk.desc: Disables buggy NPC phone portraits. Toggle if visuals are broken.

q101_enable_side_content.name: Unlock Act 1 Side Jobs
q101_enable_side_content.desc: Enables access to all Act 1 side content. Save and reload to take effect.

q000_street_kid_background.name: Street Kid Life Path
q000_street_kid_background.desc: Marks V's background as Street Kid.

warden_amazon_airdropped.name: Amazon Airdrop: Warden
warden_amazon_airdropped.desc: Marks the Warden weapon as already airdropped.

ajax_amazon_airdropped.name: Amazon Airdrop: Ajax
ajax_amazon_airdropped.desc: Marks the Ajax weapon as already airdropped.

crusher_amazon_airdropped.name: Amazon Airdrop: Crusher
crusher_amazon_airdropped.desc: Marks the Crusher weapon as already airdropped.

kyubi_amazon_airdropped.name: Amazon Airdrop: Kyubi
kyubi_amazon_airdropped.desc: Marks the Kyubi weapon as already airdropped.

grit_amazon_airdropped.name: Amazon Airdrop: Grit
grit_amazon_airdropped.desc: Marks the Grit weapon as already airdropped.

nekomata_amazon_airdropped.name: Amazon Airdrop: Nekomata
nekomata_amazon_airdropped.desc: Marks the Nekomata weapon as already airdropped.

mws_wat_02_egg_placed.name: Iguana Egg Placed
mws_wat_02_egg_placed.desc: Indicates the iguana egg has been placed in V's apartment.

mws_wat_02_iguana_hatched.name: Iguana Hatched
mws_wat_02_iguana_hatched.desc: Triggers the hatching of the iguana in V's home.

chensorship_gore.name: Remove: Gore
chensorship_gore.desc: Disables censorship for gore and violence.

chensorship_suggestive.name: Remove: Suggestive Content
chensorship_suggestive.desc: Disables censorship for sexually suggestive content.

currenttime24.label: Current Time (24H)
currenttime24.tip: Displays the current in-game time in 24-hour format.

currenttime12.label: Current Time (12H)
currenttime12.tip: Displays the current in-game time in 12-hour format with AM/PM.

synctopc.label: Sync to PC Time
synctopc.tip: Matches in-game time to your real-world PC time.

quickset.label: Quick Set
quickset.tip: Quickly set the game time to a preset hour.

skipmultiplier.label: Time Skip & Multiplier
skipmultiplier.tip: Skip in-game days or adjust time skip speed.

skipdays.label: Skip Days
skipdays.tip: How many in-game days to skip.

skipstepspeed.label: Skip Step Speed
skipstepspeed.tip: Controls how fast time skips. Higher = faster.

startskipping.label: Start Skipping
startskipping.tip: Begin time skip over the specified number of days.

freezefast.label: Freeze & Fast Forward
freezefast.tip: Freeze time or adjust day/night speed multipliers.

fasterdayspeed.label: Faster Day Speed
fasterdayspeed.tip: Enable and set daytime speed multiplier.

fasternightspeed.label: Faster Night Speed
fasternightspeed.tip: Enable and set nighttime speed multiplier.

timelapsemultiplier.label: Time-Lapse Multiplier
timelapsemultiplier.tip: How fast time speeds forward during time-lapse.

slowworld.label: Slow The World Around You
slowworld.tip: Slows down time for everything except the player (0.15x speed).

stopworld.label: Stop The World Around You
stopworld.tip: Nearly stops time for everything except the player (effectively paused).

current.label: Current Weather:
current.tip: Displays the current in-game weather preset.

reset.label: Reset Weather
reset.tip: Reset to default dynamic weather system.

weathertypebreak.label: Weather Type
weathertypebreak.tip: Select and apply a specific weather type.

worldinteractions.title: World Menu
worldinteractions.tip: Interact with world objects like doors, terminals, and more.

hotkey.label: Interaction Hotkey
hotkey.tip: Bind a key to use for World Interactions. Default is Q.

onqdoor.label: Door Interaction
onqdoor.tip: Enable to toggle door status by simply pressing the Hotkey when looking at them.

onqdevice.label: Device Interaction
onqdevice.tip: Enable to toggle electronic devices by simply pressing the Hotkey when looking at them.

npc_kill.label: Instant Kill Target
npc_kill.tip: When enabled, press the Hotkey on an NPC to kill them instantly.

onqrandomize.label: Random Appearance Target
onqrandomize.tip: Randomizes appearance of NPCs, Vehicles, Devices and other world objects instantly.

notarget.msg: No target found! Look at an object first.

fakedoor.msg: Fake door detected! Use 'Destroy Door' to remove it.

isdoor.msg: Door detected. Use 'Toggle Door Status' instead.

canttoggle.msg: Device detected but cannot be toggled.

debug.label: Debug Object
debug.tip: Draws a crosshair and real-time info about the object you are looking at.

onqremotelaunch.label: Remote Launch Vehicle
onqremotelaunch.tip: When enabled, pressing the World Interaction hotkey (Default: Q) while aiming at a vehicle will launch it into the air.

forwarddistance.label: Forward Distance
forwarddistance.tip: Set how far forward to teleport.

teleportforward.label: Teleport Forward
teleportforward.tip: Teleport forward based on current direction.

quickteleports.label: Quick Teleport
quickteleports.tip: Teleport instantly to a frequently used location.

questmarker.label: Teleport to Quest Marker
questmarker.tip: Teleport to the currently tracked quest objective.

waypointmarker.label: Teleport to Waypoint Marker
waypointmarker.tip: Teleport to the currently set map waypoint.

quickcycler.label: Teleport to:
quickcycler.tip: Cycle through quick teleport options (vendors, apartments, etc.).

creator.label: Creator
creator.tip: Filter teleport locations by their creator.

filters.label: Filters
filters.tip: Filter teleport locations by creator, district, or area.

district.label: District
district.tip: Filter teleport locations by parent district.

area.label: Area
area.tip: Filter teleport locations by child area.

selectedteleports.label: Selected Teleport Locations
selectedteleports.tip: List of teleport locations for the selected category and creator.

teleportoption.label: {location_name}

reloadteleports.label: Reload Teleports
reloadteleports.tip: Reload all teleport locations from JSON. Use after creating custom teleports.

customteleports.label: Custom Teleports
customteleports.tip: Create or manage custom teleport locations at your current position.

autoteleports.label: Auto Teleports
autoteleports.tip: Automatic teleport options for quest and waypoint markers.

autowaypoint.label: Auto Teleport to Waypoint Marker
autowaypoint.tip: If enabled, automatically teleport to the set waypoint marker.

autoquest.label: Auto Teleport to Quest Marker
autoquest.tip:
If enabled, automatically teleport to the tracked quest marker.

Important: Some quests may not clear markers properly, causing loops. Use with caution!.

settings.label: Settings
settings.tip: Toggle visibility of teleport sections and distance labels.

showforward.label: Show Fast Forward Section
showforward.tip: Toggle the forward teleport controls at the top of the menu.

showquick.label: Show Quick Teleport Section
showquick.tip: Toggle the quick teleport section (Quest marker, Waypoint, Closest vendor, etc.).

showquickdistance.label: Show Quick Distances
showquickdistance.tip: Show or hide distance text inside the quick teleport list.

showcategorydistance.label: Show Category Distances
showcategorydistance.tip: Show or hide distance text in teleport category lists.

showdistrictfilter.label: Show District Filters
showdistrictfilter.tip: Toggle the parent/child district filter dropdowns.

showcreatorfilter.label: Show Creator Filter
showcreatorfilter.tip: Toggle the creator filter dropdown (filter teleports by creator).

name.label: Name
name.tip: Enter a name for this teleport location.

translations.label: Translations
translations.tip: Change the current language and manage translation files.

layout.label: Layout & Option Row
layout.tip: Adjust layout and option row settings.

simplecontrols.label: Simple Buttons
simplecontrols.tip: Configure break row, dropdown, and string cycler controls.

inputcontrols.label: Input Buttons
inputcontrols.tip: Configure numeric and color picker controls.

snowbackground.label: Snow Background
snowbackground.tip: Adjust snow and festive light settings.

resetall.label: Reset All Settings
resetall.tip: Reset all UI and navigation (bindings) settings to defaults.

saveall.label: Save All Settings
saveall.tip: Save all UI and navigation settings to configuration files.

scrolling.label: Scrolling Settings
scrolling.tip: Configure how many options are visible before scrolling begins.

maxvisible.label: Max Visible Options
maxvisible.tip: Set the maximum number of options to show before the menu scrolls (5-30).

reset.label: Reset Size
reset.tip: Reset menu size and scale settings to defaults.

width.label: Menu Width
width.tip: Adjust the overall width of the trainer window.

height.label: Menu Height
height.tip: Adjust the fixed height of the trainer window (requires Dynamic Height to be OFF).

dynamic.label: Dynamic Height
dynamic.tip: Automatically adjust menu height based on the number of visible options.

scale.label: Menu Scale
scale.tip: Adjust the global scale of the trainer UI (affects font size).

reset.label: Reset Snow Settings
reset.tip: Reset all snow and light settings to defaults.

master.label: Enable Background
master.tip: Toggle the entire background system on or off.

snowman.label: Show Snowman
snowman.tip: Enable or disable the snowman appearance.

pile.label: Show Snow Pile
pile.tip: Toggles the accumulation of snow at the bottom.

gravity.label: Gravity
gravity.tip: Controls how fast the snowflakes fall.

wind.label: Wind Sway
wind.tip: Controls side sway for falling flakes.

density.label: Snow Density
density.tip: Number of flakes spawned per tick.

color.label: Snow Color
color.tip: Select the tint of the snowflakes.

peecolor.label: Yellow Snow Color
peecolor.tip: Defines the tint for yellow snowflakes.

peeenabled.label: Enable Yellow Snow
peeenabled.tip: Toggles yellow-tinted flakes for extra realism.

peechance.label: Yellow Snow Chance
peechance.tip: Probability for yellow flakes to spawn.

spacing.label: Spacing
spacing.tip: Pixel distance between each light bulb.

speed.label: Light Speed
speed.tip: Controls the animation speed of light twinkle.

reset.label: Reset Frame
reset.tip: Restore all frame defaults to their original values.

height.label: Height
height.tip: Vertical size of the header bar.

fontsize.label: Font Size
fontsize.tip: Font size for the main header title.

fontsizesub.label: Subtitle Font Size
fontsizesub.tip: Font size for secondary header text.

background.label: Background
background.tip: Background fill color of the header bar.

textcolor.label: Text Color
textcolor.tip: Text color used for the header title.

border.label: Header Border Color
border.tip: Defines the border color for the header.

height.label: Height
height.tip: Vertical size of the footer bar.

background.label: Background
background.tip: Background fill color of the footer bar.

textcolor.label: Text Color
textcolor.tip: Text color used for footer text.

border.label: Footer Border Color
border.tip: Defines the border color for the footer.

reset.label: Reset Info Box
reset.tip: Restore Info Box defaults to their original values.

padding.label: Padding
padding.tip: Inner padding of the info box.

spacing.label: Spacing
spacing.tip: Distance from menu to info box.

rounding.label: Rounding
rounding.tip: Corner rounding of the info box.

rotate.label: Rotate Seconds
rotate.tip: Fallback rotation time for cycling text.

reset.label: Reset Input Controls
reset.tip: Restore all input control layout defaults.

togglesize.label: Toggle Size
togglesize.tip: Size of the numeric toggle button.

togglespacing.label: Toggle Spacing
togglespacing.tip: Spacing between numeric toggle and box.

decimals.label: Decimals
decimals.tip: Number of decimal places shown for floats.

disabledcolor.label: Disabled Color
disabledcolor.tip: Text color when input is disabled.

previewboxsize.label: Preview Box Size
previewboxsize.tip: Size of the preview color box.

rounding.label: Rounding
rounding.tip: Corner rounding of color picker boxes.

reset.label: Reset Layout
reset.tip: Restore layout and option row defaults to their original values.

optionheight.label: Option Height
optionheight.tip: Vertical height of each option row.

frameheight.label: Frame Height
frameheight.tip: Height of widgets like sliders and numeric boxes.

paddingx.label: Padding X
paddingx.tip: Horizontal padding inside the menu edges.

paddingy.label: Padding Y
paddingy.tip: Vertical padding between rows and from menu edges.

backgroundcolor.label: Background Color
backgroundcolor.tip: Adjust the background color of the trainer.

labeloffsetx.label: Label Offset X
labeloffsetx.tip: Distance between row start and left-aligned labels.

framerounding.label: Frame Rounding
framerounding.tip: Corner rounding radius for rows and widgets.

framepaddingx.label: Frame Padding X
framepaddingx.tip: Inner horizontal padding for framed widgets.

framepaddingy.label: Frame Padding Y
framepaddingy.tip: Inner vertical padding for framed widgets.

smoothspeed.label: Smooth Speed
smoothspeed.tip: Speed of highlight bar smoothing when changing selection.

text.label: Text
text.tip: Primary text color for option labels.

mutedtext.label: Muted Text
mutedtext.tip: Secondary text color (break rows, inactive entries).

hoverbg.label: Hover Background
hoverbg.tip: Background color when hovering a row.

highlightbg.label: Highlight Background
highlightbg.tip: Background color of the selected row.

load.label: Load Navigation
load.tip: Load previously saved navigation speed settings.

reset.label: Reset Navigation
reset.tip: Reset navigation speed settings to their default values.

resetbindings.label: Reset All Bindings
resetbindings.tip: Restore all key and controller bindings to defaults.

openmenu.label: Open Menu
openmenu.tip: Rebind the key used to open or close the menu.

togglemouse.label: Toggle Mouse
togglemouse.tip: Rebind the key used to toggle mouse control.

up.label: Up Navigation
up.tip: Rebind the key for navigating up.

down.label: Down Navigation
down.tip: Rebind the key for navigating down.

left.label: Left Navigation
left.tip: Rebind the key for navigating left.

right.label: Right Navigation
right.tip: Rebind the key for navigating right.

select.label: Select
select.tip: Rebind the key for selecting or confirming an option.

back.label: Back
back.tip: Rebind the key for going back or closing a menu.

scrolldelay.label: Scroll Delay Base
scrolldelay.tip: Base delay (ms) between repeated inputs when holding a navigation key.

scrollmindelay.label: Scroll Min Delay
scrollmindelay.tip: Minimum delay (ms) once accelerated scrolling kicks in.

accelthreshold.label: Acceleration Threshold
accelthreshold.tip: Time (ms) a key must be held before acceleration starts.

accelstep.label: Acceleration Step
accelstep.tip: How much the delay is reduced per step while holding a key.

reset.label: Reset Notification
reset.tip: Restore notification settings to their default values.

rounding.label: Rounding
rounding.tip: Corner roundness of the notification box.

offsety.label: Offset Y
offsety.tip: Vertical offset of the progress bar inside the notification.

info.label: Progress Info
info.tip: Progress bar color for info type.

success.label: Progress Success
success.tip: Progress bar color for success type.

warning.label: Progress Warning
warning.tip: Progress bar color for warning type.

error.label: Progress Error
error.tip: Progress bar color for error type.

reset.label: Reset Selection Controls
reset.tip: Restore selection control settings to their default values.

size.label: Size
size.tip: Overall size of the toggle box.

rounding.label: Rounding
rounding.tip: Corner roundness of the toggle box.

inset.label: Inset
inset.tip: Inset for the toggle fill when ON.

statepadding.label: State Padding
statepadding.tip: Padding inside the toggle state indicator.

oncolor.label: On Color
oncolor.tip: Fill color when toggle is ON.

offcolor.label: Off Color
offcolor.tip: Fill color when toggle is OFF.

linethickness.label: Line Thickness
linethickness.tip: Thickness of the unselected circle line.

selectedcolor.label: Selected Color
selectedcolor.tip: Fill color for selected radio buttons.

reset.label: Reset Simple Controls
reset.tip: Restore simple control settings to their default values.

highlightbg.label: Highlight Background
highlightbg.tip: Background highlight color of break rows.

framesperoption.label: Frames Per Option
framesperoption.tip: How many frames to wait before revealing the next option.

revealdelay.label: Reveal Frame Delay
revealdelay.tip: Extra delay between option reveals in frames.

textcolor.label: Text Color
textcolor.tip: Normal text color for dropdown entries.

selectedcolor.label: Selected Color
selectedcolor.tip: Text color for the selected dropdown entry.

rowprefix.label: Row Prefix
rowprefix.tip: Prefix shown before each dropdown option.

framepadding.label: Frame Padding
framepadding.tip: Horizontal/vertical padding around the cycler box.

textpadding.label: Text Padding
textpadding.tip: Padding between the cycler box edge and the text.

boxrounding.label: Box Rounding
boxrounding.tip: Corner rounding of the cycler box.

framebg.label: Frame Background
framebg.tip: Background fill of the cycler box.

valuecolor.label: Value Color
valuecolor.tip: Color of the selected cycler value.

reset.label: Reset Text Input
reset.tip: Restore text input dialog settings to their default values.

width.label: Width
width.tip: Window width of the text input dialog.

height.label: Height
height.tip: Window height of the text input dialog.

rounding.label: Rounding
rounding.tip: Corner rounding of the text input window.

padding.label: Padding
padding.tip: Inner padding of the text input window.

textcolor.label: Text Color
textcolor.tip: Text color inside the text input window.

background.label: Background
background.tip: Background fill of the text input window.

border.label: Border
border.tip: Border color of the text input window.

reload.label: Refresh Languages
reload.tip: Refreshes the available language list to include newly added files.

optionmanager.dropdown_tip: Tip: Press Enter or Click to expand and select option.
optionmanager.float_toggle_tip: Tip: Use Left and Right arrow keys to switch value
optionmanager.color_tip:
Press Enter or Click to expand.
Use Arrow keys to adjust color channels.
optionmanager.stringcycler_tip: Tip: Use Left and Right arrow keys to switch value.
optionmanager.inttoggle_tip: Tip: Use Left and Right arrow keys to switch value.

hotkey.label: Hotkey
hotkey.tip: Bind a key to trigger world interactions

debug.label: Debug Object
debug.tip: Show debug information for targeted objects

unlockdoor.label: Unlock Door
unlockdoor.tip: Toggle/unlock doors when looking at them and pressing the hotkey

openfakedoors.label: Open Fake Doors
openfakedoors.tip: Remove fake doors when looking at them and pressing the hotkey

onqdevice.label: Device Interaction
onqdevice.tip: Interact with devices when looking at them and pressing the hotkey

npc_kill.label: Instant Kill
npc_kill.tip: Instantly kill NPCs when looking at them and pressing the hotkey

onqrandomize.label: Randomize Appearance
onqrandomize.tip: Randomize NPC appearance when looking at them and pressing the hotkey

onqremotelaunch.label: Remote Launch Vehicle
onqremotelaunch.tip: Launch vehicles when looking at them and pressing the hotkey
